name: fgui-frame
description: FGUI Game Framework for Cocos Creator

scripts.build: npx tsc && npx terser dist/GameFrame.js -c -m --comments false -o dist/GameFrame.tmp.js && move /Y dist\GameFrame.tmp.js dist\GameFrame.js
scripts.build:prod: npx tsc && npx terser dist/GameFrame.js -c -m --comments false --compress drop_console=true --mangle toplevel=true -o dist/GameFrame.tmp.js && move /Y dist\GameFrame.tmp.js dist\GameFrame.js
